author: Special Correspondent
text:
A mega medical camp by the Department of Health and a massive milk pot procession by the women’s wing of the All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam marked the 68th birthday celebrations of Chief Minister Jayalalithaa in the district on Sunday. Collector S. Natarajan inaugurated the medical camp, organised by Government District Headquarters Hospital at Idayarvalasai near here, in which a team of doctors from various disciplines examined about 400 people.

Hospital Superintendent D.K. Krishnamoorthy said that the team of doctors screened the people and referred 72 of them for further treatment to the government hospital here.

Local Member of Parliament A. Anwar Raja and Joint Director of (Health services) Sahaya Stephen Raj were among those present in the camp.

AIADMK women’s wing, led by its district secretary Kavitha Sasikumar, celebrated Jayalalithaa’s birthday by organising a massive milk pot procession at Mudukulathur.

Minister for Sports and Youth Welfare S. Sundararaj and district secretary A. Dharmar were among those who participated in the event, she added.
title: Mega medical camp organised in Ramanathapuram
